Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbalnauts,

I've read somewhere, that Mechjeb has a feature to display the time until my ship crashes into the planet. But I can't find it anywhere, although I would love to have it!

I know Engineer Redux has the feature, but I don't want to install another mod!

Can somebody help me?

I've heard that too, could never find it. That's not to say it isn't there though. I use Engineer Redux as well as MJ. Can get messy at times trying to keep 2 GUI intensive add-ons under control but it saves my hide a few times.

Maybe try creating a custom window and looking through all the variables you can add to it. The impact time might be in one of the surface or vessel tabs
If you open the Custom Window Editor at the bottom of the window there should be a set of arrow buttons with a scroll bar, it's in there somewhere. (Under Surface I believe)
